Comments_List: Excellent course structure and set up. The intimate size of the course enabled constructive and in-depth reflective discussions that were very formative. Auditing this course gave me the opportunity to enhance my understanding both particular problem sets within the Middle East as well as improving my big-picture understanding of the region as a whole.
